versions.name: AWS Route Table Created v101.0.0
versions.description: Identifies when an AWS Route Table has been created.
author: Elastic
Austin Songer
false_positives: Route Tables may be created by a system or network administrators. Verify whether the user identity, user agent, and/or hostname should be making changes in your environment. Route Table creation by unfamiliar users or hosts should be investigated. If known behavior is causing false positives, it can be exempted from the rule. Automated processes that use Terraform may lead to false positives.
versions.query:
event.dataset:aws.cloudtrail and event.provider:cloudtrail.amazonaws.com and event.action:(CreateRoute or CreateRouteTable) and
event.outcome:success
versions.setup: The AWS Fleet integration, Filebeat module, or similarly structured data is required to be compatible with this rule.
